hero_image.title: Hero image - Cybersecurity workspace
hero_image.description: Minimalistyczny workspace z laptopem wyświetlającym dashboard bezpieczeństwa i metryki zabezpieczeń
hero_image.alt_text: Minimalistyczny workspace z laptopem pokazującym dashboard bezpieczeństwa strony internetowej
hero_image.prompt: Clean minimalist workspace flat lay, laptop displaying security dashboard with SSL certificate status, firewall metrics and backup indicators, white wooden desk, smartphone, yellow notebook, coffee cup, natural daylight, professional business aesthetic, muted colors black white gray with yellow accent, high quality, no people

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Minimalist, clean workspace, modern tech aesthetic, avoid people in frame

section_media.title: Koszt cyberataku vs koszt zabezpieczeń
section_media.description: Wykres porównujący średni koszt skutecznego cyberataku z rocznymi kosztami zabezpieczeń
section_media.alt_text: Wykres porównania kosztów: cyberatak 12,5 mln zł vs zabezpieczenia 15 tys. zł rocznie
section_media.prompt: Clean comparison bar chart showing cyberattack costs vs security investment costs, dramatic difference in scale, red bar for attack costs, green bar for security costs, values in Polish zloty, professional infographic style, minimalist design black white gray with yellow highlights

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Dramatic scale difference, use contrasting colors to emphasize the gap

section_media.title: Warstwa ochrony - Defense in Depth
section_media.description: Infografika przedstawiająca wielowarstwowy system zabezpieczeń jako koncentryczne kręgi ochrony
section_media.alt_text: Infografika wielowarstwowego systemu zabezpieczeń strony internetowej - firewall, SSL, monitoring
section_media.prompt: Circular defense in depth infographic showing security layers: outer ring firewall, middle ring SSL encryption, inner ring monitoring and backups, clean minimalist design, blue and gray gradients, professional cybersecurity illustration style, geometric shapes, no people

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Circular/concentric design, tech colors (blue, gray), geometric and clean

section_media.title: Panel SSL w przeglądarce
section_media.description: Screenshot pokazujący kłódkę SSL i informacje o certyfikacie w pasku adresu przeglądarce
section_media.alt_text: Panel certyfikatu SSL w przeglądarce Chrome pokazujący zabezpieczone połączenie HTTPS
section_media.prompt: Clean browser screenshot mockup showing SSL certificate details panel in Chrome, green padlock icon, certificate information popup, HTTPS in address bar, professional e-commerce website visible, clean interface design, highlighted security elements

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean browser interface, focus on SSL indicators, professional website context

section_media.title: Strategia backup 3-2-1
section_media.description: Diagram ilustrujący strategię 3-2-1: 3 kopie, 2 różne nośniki, 1 kopia offline
section_media.alt_text: Diagram strategii backup 3-2-1 dla bezpiecznego przechowywania kopii zapasowych
section_media.prompt: Clean flowchart diagram illustrating 3-2-1 backup strategy, three data copies connected by arrows, two different storage types icons (local drive and cloud), one offline copy highlighted, minimalist infographic style, blue and gray color scheme with yellow accents, professional IT diagram

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean diagram style, use icons for storage types, clear flow between elements

section_media.title: Timeline reakcji na naruszenie RODO
section_media.description: Oś czasu pokazująca 72-godzinny proces zgłaszania naruszenia danych do UODO
section_media.alt_text: Timeline procedury zgłaszania naruszenia RODO - 72 godziny od wykrycia do zgłoszenia
section_media.prompt: Horizontal timeline infographic showing RODO breach notification process, 72-hour deadline highlighted, key milestones: detection, assessment, notification to UODO, client communication, professional compliance design, red and blue color scheme, clean arrows and icons

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Horizontal timeline, emphasize 72-hour deadline, use compliance colors (official blue/red)

section_media.title: Dashboard monitoringu 24/7
section_media.description: 3D render przedstawiający futurystyczny dashboard z alertami bezpieczeństwa i metrykami monitoringu
section_media.alt_text: Dashboard monitoringu bezpieczeństwa z alertami i metrykami czasu rzeczywistego 24/7
section_media.prompt: Modern 3D render of cybersecurity monitoring dashboard, floating holographic screens showing security alerts, real-time metrics, threat detection graphs, dark background with blue and yellow highlights, futuristic but professional aesthetic, clean geometric shapes, no people

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Dark tech interface, blue/yellow highlights, professional monitoring aesthetic
